summary: This mod adds John Travolta voice overs to the dragons, making them hilarious to fight.
descriptionHtml:
This is a funny sound mod we did in a boring Friday afternoon that make the dragons sound like John Travolta from south park (check out this video for reference: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A-L4VvWHrVc)

To install, just paste the sound folder into your Skyrim/Data directory.
If you feel like it\'s too much you can take some files out at your discretion.

Enjoy!

Thanks to Erazmuz for the awesome voice overs.

Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6UsDkT9kcAk
author: Litos
